name: ccdash
description: Claude Code Dashboard - A comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Claude Code

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: if [ -d "backend" ]; then cd backend && go build -o ../bin/ccdash-server cmd/server/main.go; else echo "Backend directory not found, skipping backend build (likely CI environment)"; fi
scripts.build:frontend: if [ -d "frontend" ] && [ "$CI" != "true" ]; then cd frontend && (npm ci || npm install) && npx next build; else echo "Skipping frontend build (CI environment or frontend directory not found)"; fi
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend

author: CCDash team
